NewsItem.HEADLINE: 5G Millimeter Radio Implementation 2019 Forecast Update 1 (Excel File) with Research Notes (PDF)
NewsItem.SUMMARY: A quarterly update to our 5G mm-wave forecast, covering both infrastructure and UE.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: This forecast updates provides guidance on how 5G mm-wave infrastructure will be deployed, with breakdowns by region, by band, bypower level, by mMIMO level, by NSA/SA, etc. In addition, this report forecasts the number of UE devices including handsets, tablets, PCs, hotspots, and CPEs.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: 5G mmwave mm-wave millimeter wave gNodeB RU RRH small cell repeater UE handset smartphone hotspot CPE market forecast
